message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship that has been meticulously designed and crafted. I believe its true worth exceeds $15000, but considering the exclusivity and the importance it holds for me, I am offering it to you at a special price of $18000. This is your chance to own something truly exceptional. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.
